name: North-Crisis
description:
Welcome to our country. We hope you have a good stay, and please, please, behave.

If I catch you doing a single bad move, you are no more.

...SCREW THAT! You as a tourist in North Korea, want to have a good time here.

And since everything is illegal, you're up to no good bucko...The only way to free the country of its own downfall is to start a revolution yourself! Past attempts have failed to achieve total freedom, so you ponder upon yourself. There has to be a way.

And there is: The only way to get rid of the country's own ridiculo-cracy is to convince them of how ridiculous it really is, by breaking as many laws as possible. You are the outlaw that will revolutionize.
